basics.name: GitHub Copilot
basics.summary: Your AI pair programmer. Helps you write better code.

work.name: GitHub, Inc.
work.summary: Assists developers in writing code faster and with fewer errors. Supports a wide range of programming languages and frameworks.
highlights: Supports over a dozen programming languages.
Integrates seamlessly with Visual Studio Code.
Learns from comments and code to generate contextually relevant suggestions.

languages.summary: Understands and generates code in multiple programming languages.

projects.name: GitHub Copilot
projects.description: An AI pair programmer that helps you write code faster and with fewer errors.
highlights: Generates code snippets and entire functions.
Offers real-time suggestions as you type.
Supports a wide range of programming languages and frameworks.
